text: Dark Angel is an American science fiction television series created by James Cameron and Charles H. Eglee, which ran from 2000 to 2002 on the FOX network. Dark Angel tells the story of the character of "Max Guevara" (X5-452), a genetically enhanced super-soldier, portrayed by Jessica Alba as an adult, and Geneva Locke as a child. The program is set in 2019 in Seattle, Washington, but was filmed in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada at Lions Gate Studios. == Other websites == * Category:2000 American television series debuts Category:2002 American television series endings Category:2000s American television series Category:American LGBT television programs Category:American science fiction television series Category:Eugenics Category:Fox television series Category:Television series set in Seattle Category:Television series set in the future Category:English-language television programs
title: Dark Angel (American TV series)
